title: We need a legendary Braum skin

replies.body:
We do! Any... other ideas?

Braum-berjack? Brau-max? Gentleman Braum? Plushie Braum? Braum and the Hendersons? Mind if i cut in Braum? Aslan Braum? Reverse Braum? Adblock Braum? AutoBraum Rollout!
What about something dark, like Forsaken Braum?
Personally I am a big fan of evil skins for good champions >:)

In that case maybe you would like this skin I found on Deviantart!

http://img04.deviantart.net/9ecc/i/2015/089/7/1/braum_safe_breaker_by_karamlik-d8fjfzo.png

The muscle of Safe Cracker {{champion:28}} and {{champion:29}} !
I do like it, reminds me of the Mafia skins we haven't done for a while.

> [{quoted}](name=Sciraen,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=X9HbApFg,comment-id=00030004,timestamp=2016-10-05T05:34:00.424+0000)
>
> What about something dark, like Forsaken Braum?

{{champion:201}}  The poro is the only creature whose heart is pure.

Mother always said..."Braum, do what you think is right."

My shield is my sword. Don't get too much blood on it.

The heart is the strongest muscle. And you are all weaklings.
I read Aslan braum as Asian braum
I was imagining him in a lion onesy with a magical Wardrobe Shield
How about Asgore Braum instead?

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=X9HbApFg,comment-id=0003000200000002,timestamp=2016-10-05T10:39:42.362+0000)
>
> How about Asgore Braum instead?

{{champion:201}} "Summoner...it was nice to meet you. Good bye."

"Would you like some tea?"

"I will show you no mercy. Because I know I deserve none."
Is that the one from Narnia
Bingo
#nightmareFuel

As for other ideas, Gym Braum, Gatekeeper Braum to accompany Gatekeeper Galio (Which I own and love dearly), Cosmic Guardian Braum (counterpart to Cosmic Reaver Kassadin), Ascended (Shuriman) Braum, Blackfrost Braum (an evil icy companion for Blackfrost Anivia, which I also find awesome), Anti-Virus Braum (Bane of the final boss), and Deep Terror Braum.
Love these ideas. Norton Antivirus Braum and Avast Antivirus GP?
Yes! It'd make an amazing duo, and I love how much it'd fit the two.

I'll take any GP skin!
Preferably a Deep Terror GP (Davy Jones) or an armored GP though.
Anti-virus sounds more from the Program AU than from the Arcade AU.

The other day I was talking to my friend about this doorman Braum where his shield is a classic wooden door, and braum is wearing a tuxedo with a groomed moustache. His Q shoots out a doorbell, his W remains similar, his E puts hinges on the door, and his R rolls out a red carpet. The recall is where Braum is greeting guests.

Just my imagination doe.

I imagine that reverse braum would be like the shield holding braum stiff and motionless to protect itself. lol
Braumderful idea!
Now tell me how the hell should look like a reverse braum. lol
He uses his shield as a mustache and a mustache as a shield.
French Maid Braum

Braum Armstrong.

"These muscles have been passed down the Armstrong line since I was born."

"Braum and the Hendersons" 

OMG.... I LOVE THAT MOVIE!

HALLOWEEN BRAUM. SO... Depending on the theme.. 

I FOUND IT. FRANKENSTEIN BRAUM!!!

Zombie and his shield comes out his arm in a fleshy green spiral.
Maybe his Q could be his hand and it grows back.
...AND HIS NAME WAS ANGUS

>  Reverse Braum?

Braum dressed as a giant shield HAHAHAH

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=X9HbApFg,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-10-05T03:44:37.496+0000)
>
> We do! Any... other ideas?
> 
> Braum-berjack? Brau-max? Gentleman Braum? Plushie Braum? Braum and the Hendersons? Mind if i cut in Braum? Aslan Braum? Reverse Braum? Adblock Braum? AutoBraum Rollout!

Braum-a Bull.

State Hextechnologist Braum-strong

Survey Corps Braum-in

-googles buff wizards-

http://66.media.tumblr.com/bdaa5398bbaf5b0a2303e031daf2b856/tumblr_n8shz1soYU1ru9u6io2_1280.jpg

http://66.media.tumblr.com/ce0dc121693b5455c199313d2df12683/tumblr_n8shz1soYU1ru9u6io1_1280.jpg

#Okay....
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m7RosIoQisA
Wow dat boott
**_L E W D_**
we need definitely not braum where his shield gets a suit and a mustache lol

Major Braumstrong
https://media.giphy.com/media/26hisuyB2ms3MUdgc/giphy.gif?noredirect

they could rename the skin to military braum and give him the coat. the door would a ripped off metal door with his physique etched into it, his q would be a alchemized rock, w would cast the alchemist symbol under braum and his target instead of a shield symbol, cant really change anything with e, and his ult he rips off his coat then punches the ground.

i really liked this Arcade Braum idea:
http://i.imgur.com/RLfRKPD.jpg


https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/55/7d/4b/557d4b5dd7b779d610df59385f7c2658.jpg
alt:
http://66.media.tumblr.com/d27b84eeb594bad26540ae1778a2f4bd/tumblr_o60bjatXIU1rra7kvo1_500.png

Other ideas: bbq Braum (Butcher Olaf's buddy!), maybe some futuristic skin (I'd drool for some hulkbuster inspired skin...maybe not on Braum though), captain america braum 

But if I had to choose one, it would be this:
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BcI741MOUNo/U3V-oRZSWHI/AAAAAAAAYuE/MqnGRq9te2E/s1600/pool-party-braum.jpg
I think it embodies some of the most obvious ideas for him: striped, full-body swimsuit, inflatable shield and it's reminiscent of the strongmen :)

Muscle Wizard Braum would be amazing, he wouldn't have the shield out unless he's in combat. His ultimate will be the same color as the shield as to not cause confusion.
I CAST FIST
inxibitor hurt braum
Maybe reverse Braum where a big shield is protected by a little Braum
Angus the Puncher skin.
